resources.string: The sync was completed, an error occurred some or all of the sync profile.
No of copies=%s, No of deletes=%s, No of ignores=%s
The files last modification time was different, media store option was valid but ignores the update for.
No of copies=%s, No of deletes=%s, No of ignores=%s, No of warnings=%s, No of retries=%s, No of errors=%s
Last modified time was different between local and MediaStore. Local file last modified=%s , MediaStore last modified=%s
Do you want to overwrite the file?\n%s\n(Please uncheck the “Confirm” in the synchronization profile if confirmation is not required)
Do you want to delete the file?\n%s\n(Please uncheck the “Confirm” in the synchronization profile if confirmation is not required)
JAVA File#setLastModified() was failed, Please enable the option of sync profile “Obtain the last modified date and time of the local file as SMBSync” sync profile option.
SmbFileFile#setLastModified() was failed, Please enable the option of sync profile “Do not reset remote file last modified time by local file last modified time” sync profile option.
Master mount point can not read.
Local mount point can not write.
Mount point is different, but access to the same directory physical. Please specify the physical different mount point by target or master profile. Master=%s, target=%s
File creation error has occurred when checking the physical access to the file. File path=%s
I ignored the directory because the same directory can not be synchronized. Directory=%s
Specified remote SMB host name was not found. Hostname=
Can not be connecting to specified remote SMB host. IP Address=%s
Can not be connecting to specified remote SMB host. IP Address=%s, Port=%s
Remote server %s is can be connected
Remote server %s is the connection impossible
Abort the retry because exceeded the number of retries
